And it's just one example of how black women's childbirth experiences are different than those of white women. </description><link>https://www.glamour.com/story/serena-williams-childbirth-experience-wake-up-call</link><guid isPermaLink="false">5a5e5a7af8217e384fe98357</guid><pubDate>Wed, 17 Jan 2018 19:43:36 +0000</pubDate><media:content/><category>Health-Fitness</category><media:keywords>Pregnancy, Childbirth</media:keywords><dc:creator>Jamila Perritt, M.D., M.P.H.</dc:creator><dc:modified>Thu, 18 Jan 2018 19:08:46 +0000</dc:modified><dc:publisher>Condé Nast</dc:publisher><media:thumbnail url="https://media.glamour.com/photos/5a5fa6dd9a5b2e5748322793/master/pass/GettyImages-609972912.jpg" width="3712" height="3712"/></item><item><title>Serena Williams Got Extremely Personal About the Scary Circumstances of Her Daughter's Birth</title><description>In a new Facebook post, Serena Williams thanks fans for the outpouring of support after she revealed the scary circumstances surrounding her daughter Alexis Olympia Ohanian Jr.'s birth and calls for more work to be done so that all women, especially black women, have safer births and pregnancies. </description><link>https://www.glamour.com/story/serena-williams-personal-facebook-post-daughters-birth</link><guid isPermaLink="false">5a5dfb4c2c6d93034067f9ac</guid><pubDate>Tue, 16 Jan 2018 15:21:32 +0000</pubDate><media:content/><category>Health-Fitness</category><media:keywords>Serena Williams</media:keywords><dc:creator>Abby Gardner</dc:creator><dc:modified>Tue, 16 Jan 2018 20:35:53 +0000</dc:modified><dc:publisher>Condé Nast</dc:publisher><media:thumbnail url="https://media.glamour.com/photos/5a5e03b7b126d712206e958c/master/pass/23279200_476735262726422_8145360843563859968_n.jpg" width="1080" height="1080"/></item><item><title>Not All Women Regret Getting Abortions. I Don't Regret Mine, and Everyone Should Have the Choice</title><description>Abortion is often spoken of as a terrible physical hardship, but I have a slightly different perspective.
